service.name: Micropeels (Chemical Peels)

seo.title: Chemical Peels in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Customized superficial-to-medium peels to smooth texture, fade discoloration, clear breakouts, and boost glow—calibrated to your skin and downtime.

overview.p1: Our Micropeels use clinical acids—lactic, glycolic, salicylic, TCA, and modern blended formulas—chosen to match your goals and tolerance.
overview.p2: Your esthetician tunes strength, layers, and aftercare so you get visible results with the right amount of downtime. Great as a series or seasonal refresh.

whyReluxe.title: Truly custom
whyReluxe.body: From gentle brightening to acne control to pigment lifting—we match actives and depth to your skin.

whyReluxe.title: Safe protocols
whyReluxe.body: Thoughtful prep and aftercare with options for sensitive skin and all skin tones.

whyReluxe.title: Series-driven results
whyReluxe.body: A plan of 3–6 treatments with homecare and progress photos to track change.

service.tagline: Smoother, brighter, clearer skin—on your terms.

howItWorks.title: Consultation
howItWorks.body: We review your goals, history, and design a personalized plan.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

items.heading: Brightening
items.body: Lactic/glycolic blends to even tone with minimal downtime.

items.heading: Clarifying
items.body: Salicylic-focused peels for congestion and blemish-prone skin.

items.heading: Advanced
items.body: TCA or layered blends for stubborn pigment and texture.

items.heading: Boosters
items.body: Dermaplane, LED, hydration masks to enhance glow and comfort.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
